org.infogrid.comm

Interface SendingMessageEndpoint<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the message type
    All Superinterfaces:
    MessageEndpoint<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BidirectionalMessageEndpoint<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFireAndForgetSendingMessageEndpoint, AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint

    public interface SendingMessageEndpoint<T>
extends MessageEndpoint<T>
    A message endpoint for sending messages. The method enqueueMessageForSend is used for asynchronous sending of messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enqueueMessageForSend(T msg)
      Send a message on the regular schedule.
      java.util.List<T> messagesToBeSent()
      Obtain the Messages still to be sent.
      void sendMessageAsap(T msg)
      Send a message as quickly as possible.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.infogrid.comm.MessageEndpoint

        addDirectMessageEndpointListener, addSoftMessageEndpointListener, addWeakMessageEndpointListener, removeMessageEndpointListener
